title: Gorgeous 1153 sq ft loft for rent. Close to Everything, Far from Ordinary!
posting_body: ['2 Bedroom  2 Bathroom | 1153 sq ft | $2715/Month', '4800 Excelsior', '4800 Excelsior Blvd', 'Saint Louis Park, MN 55416', 'show contact info', 'Description:', 'Just walk outside your front door to extend your living space and enjoy the amazing community amenities at 4800Excelsior.', "Feel like you're on vacation as you relax on our rooftop terrace: take a dip in our shimmering pool, unwind in the Jacuzzi, and get cozy in our elegantly styled fireside lounge while you gaze at the stunning Minneapolis skyline.", 'Entertain friends in our impressive outdoor kitchen or reserve the stylish ClubRoom for special events.', "You'll love our complimentary coffee bar, heated underground garage parking, bike storage area, and pet-friendly environment.", 'And take advantage of the conveniently located Fresh Thyme Farmers Market right in our own building.', 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Air Conditioning', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Dining Room', '● Dishwasher', '● Energy Star Certified
